Class Sprite

  • java.lang.Object
    • entityPackage.Entity
      • entityPackage.Sprite
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Entity>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    GameObject

    public class Sprite
extends Entity
    Sprite directly extends the Entity class adds Sprites or animation to the Entity loads all the Animation
    Author:
    watacoso

             int x,
             int y,
             boolean flipped)
        Adds Sprite to the owners spriteList
        Parameters:
        owner - Owner of the Sprite
        name - Name of the Sprite
        x - X-Position you get the Sprite at off the SpriteSheet
        y - Y-Position you get the Sprite at off the SpriteSheet
        flipped - if true the sprite is added flipped
